name: Deadline Dodger
description:
Dodge stuff

Move using arrows. Collect as many coins as you can to get the highest score. The difficulty rises every 45 seconds.

Game was made by Arkadiusz Kućmierz, Mateusz Kukuła and Patryk Bożek for an uni assignment

Used assets:

  • Fireballs sprites - https://kvsr.itch.io/fireball-animation
  • Every other sprite - https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Based on a boilerplate https://gitlab.com/chinchilla_games/phaser-ce-boilerplate
